channel.title: The bringer of light - [alch_18 x etchris]
channel.description: This is a track I made with my brother which will also be part of my upcoming. Just wanted to get a couple of songs released before then. This song is the main inspiration for the album and a sort of progression from the crazy year 2020 was for me personally and looking at 2021 as a way to grow and improve. [the bringer of light](https://soundcloud.com/etchris/thebringeroflight) ![led by the light (5)|500x500](upload://dg3bJ6fWn49mwLXCfqot4OkBDV4.png)

This is a track I made with my brother which will also be part of my upcoming. Just wanted to get a couple of songs released before then.
